channel.title: Additem

item.title: Additem
item.dc:creator: @dfsniper dfsniper
item.description:
@dfsniper wrote:

Im trying to make a new command that u can just type: “additem 1305,1” ingame that u have item 1305 (d long)
for example:

if.commandStartsWith("additem x,y")) { addItem (x,y) }
any help?

Read full topic
